src:
Ni ansatte rammet av mc-konkurs
06 Nov 2019, 14:49 by Alexander Killingberg
Midt-Norges eneste Harley-Davidson-forhandler er konkurs.
Butikken på Sluppen i Trondheim har blant annet solgt Harley-Davidson motorsykler, kjøreutstyr og merkeklær. I tillegg har bedriften drevet verksted og tilbudt vinterlagring av motorsykler.
text:
Nine employees affected by bankruptcy
06 Nov 2019, 14:49 by Alexander Killingberg
Central Norway's only Harley-Davidson dealer is bankrupt.
The store at Sluppen in Trondheim has, among other things, sold Harley-Davidson motorcycles, driving equipment and brand clothing. In addition, the company has run a workshop and offered winter storage of motorcycles.
